Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 63rd/Dan Ryan
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 63rd/Dan Ryan due to police activity. Crews working to restore service. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 63rd/Dan Ryan due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

As a result of the delay, Howard-bound Red Line trains will bypass the 63rd/Dan Ryan station.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
